entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 8. POP 30%
